The blessings of Velik are upon you, .

Thanks to your courage, the goddess is finally safe from Lakan. Words alone cannot express our gratitude.

The goddess is weakened from her ordeal, but her wounds are not critical.

Still, Lakan's dark power has not dissipated. I can feel it all around us. Until it is gone, the sanctuary is not a safe place for Velik.

We will escort her someplace safe until she can recover.

Thank you again. Your bravery is truly legendary.
